'''Kornelia Stoiber''' is a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_scientist computer scientist] from [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austria Austria] who studied at a variety of universities and won a [https://ocg.at/fp-fh national IT incentive award]. In addition, she took courses in [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/design design] and playing the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/clarinet clarinet].<ref>{{Cite web

'''Videos:''' This user's favourite video is currently [https://youtube.com/watch?v=7aa_ik_UYTw "The 100,000 Qubit Quantum-Centric Supercomputer of 2033"] by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBM_Research IBM Research].

'''Music:''' This user's favourite performance extracts are currently from the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concerto_in_F_(Gershwin) Gershwin Concerto in F] [https://facebook.com/share/v/kHrnenbcALnmJwmb on Facebook] and [https://instagram.com/p/CXwNSXosiF_ on Instagram], performed by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuja_Wang Yuja Wang] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Tilson_Thomas Michael Tilson Thomas] together with the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London_Symphony_Orchestra London Symphony Orchestra].
